Open the executable using x32dbg, search for strings and find the â€œPassword:â€ string. Near it you can find â€œqwertyâ€ saved as a string. Before the strcmp call there is another function call that performs anti-debugging, turn that into nop and step through the execution, you will be able to see a â€œCorrectâ€ message before the window shuts down.
